actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The werebear makes two claw attacks  two greataxe attacks  or two handaxe attacks.

actions.name: Greataxe (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Handaxe (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Claw (Bear or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature  it is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends  the werebear can't use its greataxe and can't attack a different target with its claw.

actions.name: Bite (Bear or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid  it makes a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  it is cursed with werebear lycanthropy.

bonus_actions.name: Shapeshift
bonus_actions.desc: The werebear changes its form to a Large bear, a Large bear-humanoid hybrid, or into its true form, which is a humanoid. While shapeshifted, its statistics are unchanged except for its size. It can't speak in bear form. Its equipment is not transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

bonus_actions.name: Frenzied Bite (While Bloodied
bonus_actions.desc: The werebear makes a bite attack.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The werebear has advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Wolfsbane
special_abilities.desc: Lycanthropes are repelled by the wolfsbane flower. A lycanthrope in hybrid or beast form is poisoned while within 10 feet of a living or dried wolfsbane flower that it can smell. If wolfsbane is applied to a weapon or ammunition, lycanthropes are damaged by the weapon as if it were silver. An application of wolfsbane lasts for 1 hour.
